text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With after-school training complete, I<n>head over to the water
fountain. There,<n>I spot Mejiro Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ahhh! Now that feels good!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! I just put my head under the<n>faucet! Nothing beats a
cold shower<n>after training!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wanna give it a shot?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Aw, man... But it feels so good on the<n>shoulder muscles.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: As she smiles back at me, I notice her<n>eyes look a little red...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wh-what?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: O-of course not! Why would I be...<n>crying...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tears well up in her eyes as she<n>struggles to remain calm. I
decide to<n>give her some space until she settles<n>down.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Phew... You've got sharp eyes, you<n>know that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: You see... I keep losing to McQueen in<n>scrimmages.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
No matter how hard I try, I just can't<n>catch up to her. It's
just so... so...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Frustrating... Guess winning isn't as<n>easy as it seems.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking closer, I notice that Mejiro<n>Ryan appears more
gaunt than usual.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On top of our training, she also works<n>out on her own. If
she's not properly<n>fueling her body...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Uh... I think so? At least, I'm<n>pretty sure I ate
breakfast today.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Well... That makes it abundantly clear.<n>As her trainer,
there's only one thing<n>for me to do.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The cafeteria is mostly deserted this<n>late in the day. I notice
Mejiro Ryan<n>idly looking about the room, perhaps<n>out of
boredom.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before long, the XXL pork cutlet curry<n>I ordered is placed
before her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Whoa! T-Trainer, what's going on?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: B-but eating this late in the day isn't<n>good for—
choice_data_list: Forget about that and dig in! Just for today!
Forget about that and dig in! Just for today!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ...Okay, if you insist. I mean, itdoes look good.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Thanks for the food!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan devours the massive<n>curry dish in the blink of
an eye!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Mmm... mmmmm!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
My tongue's screaming in delight... I<n>can feel my muscles
thanking me for<n>all the extra protein!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Now that I think about it... I havebeen a bit too preoccupied with racinglately. I don't know how long it's been since I last sat down to a fullmeal.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I guess when I'm frustrated, I tend to<n>forget important stuff
like that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's not uncommon for runners to put<n>too much focus on
their failures,<n>causing them to neglect their health.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Once she opens her eyes and<n>realizes what she's doing,
I'm sure<n>Ryan will see what a disservice<n>she's doing to
herself and her<n>potential.
choice_data_list: Let's unlock even more of your talent.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: My talent...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan stares out the window<n>at the girls passing by,
deep in<n>thought.
